Installation¶

  1. All users should receive an apk file with the moonbeam application

  2. SideQuest this onto the Oculus

  1. If unsure how to use SideQuest follow this tutorial: How To Sideload Oculus Quest Content With SideQuest (2021) (uploadvr.com)

    1. After the setup portion, you want to follow the instructions on Sideloading an .apk from an external source

  1. Once it is successfully on your quest you will find the package by going on Apps-> Unknown Sources -> Moonbeam (Figure 0.1-0.3)

  1. If Moonbeam does not appear under Unknown Sources, then redo the SideQuest tutorial
